Howzit, I'm Devon Taft. I've had the privilege of engaging in co-creating and launching projects for clients in various industries. I’m a keen advocate of WordPress best practices with an enhanced attention to detail. devon.co.za is my digital home, feel free to contact me by email at hello@devon.co.za.

Some of My Work

Devon is a self-taught and extremely passionate developer. He knows Wordpress like the back of his hand, and can apply himself to any other programming language should a problem need solving! Devon understands the design process and strives to both educate and learn from the designers he works with.
